actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Agriculture.

official_title: A joint resolution providing that the Secretary of Agriculture shall not adopt as final rules proposed rules issued on December 29, 1981, which would change the standards for grading carcass beef and slaughter cattle or issue proposed rules or adopt final rules identical in substance to such rules.

summary.text: Prohibits the Secretary of Agriculture (in an exercise of congressional veto) from: (1) adopting specified proposed rules regarding the standards for grading carcass beef and slaughter cattle; or (2) issuing proposed rules or adopting final ones identical in substance to such proposed rules.

titles.title: A joint resolution providing that the Secretary of Agriculture shall not adopt as final rules proposed rules issued on December 29, 1981, which would change the standards for grading carcass beef and slaughter cattle or issue proposed rules or adopt final rules identical in substance to such rules.
